text:
:mega: :alert: *Update your developer projects version by March 31, 2024* :alert:

Starting Mar 31, 2024, new project builds with platformVersion 2023.1, and projects with unspecified versions will no longer be supported. Please update your project to the latest version as soon as possible, for more information see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/platform-versioning|Projects platform versioning (BETA)>.
Just adding this here for the react team to see, is anything being done in this area?

Thanks for the feedback. I donâ€™t want to speak for the whole team but I personally do not have a lot of experience with our serverless function experiences, especially the difference between CMS vs project-based serverless functions.

I appreciate the heads up here and the candidness (of you an others) in the other threads.
